title: Problem with login on EUNE!!
body:
I send message to RIOT to see what is with login problem on EUNE but i dont hawe a answor 7 day i cant play and i spend lot money on this acc...eu west i can play normally...help pls what the f... is problem??? RIOT you send me a masage i need to be  patience hahah and how can i how??
can you fix this or not?? 400â‚¬ is not little bit

replies.body: It looks like you already have a ticket submitted, and our tech team will be able to help out.  It's important to keep it to a single ticket to prevent any confusion or delay in a response.  Thanks for your patience!
